subject: Hockey, Ice
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: The head of the N.H.L. players’ union said Monday that negotiations on a new collective bargaining agreement will begin perhaps as early as this week. He didn’t rule out talks stretching into the season.
snippet: The head of the N.H.L. players’ union said Monday that negotiations on a new collective bargaining agreement will begin perhaps as early as this week. He didn’t rule out talks stretching into the season.
